explanation: [0-0] A person wearing a black top, gray pants, and an Ultraman mask is standing in front of a wooden door with spring festival couplets. They are holding a silver plate containing a white substance. The person in the Ultraman mask has a piece of red paper with black characters on it tucked under their right arm. Red ornaments hang on both sides of the wooden door.

[0-3] Subsequently, the person wearing the Ultraman mask scoops up a handful of the white substance from the silver basin with their left hand and smears it on the wooden door. They then use their left hand to stick the red paper tucked under their right arm onto the wooden door. Afterward, a hand pulls the man wearing the Ultraman mask to the left. Then, a man dressed in black walks up to the wooden door, holding a roll of pink tape. The man in black tears off a piece of pink tape with his mouth and sticks it onto the red paper with the black characters.
